title: AI, Chatbots & Fun!
text:
Meet ChatGPT

Imagine it as a robot that lives in the internet

title: AI, Chatbots & Fun!
text:
Like a smart librarian

It learnt by reading many books 📚






Summaries
Creative inspiration
Reading comprehension

title: AI, Chatbots & Fun!
text:
How it works: Machine Learning

We give the computer a prediction task
And teach them by showing millions of examples

title: AI, Chatbots & Fun!
text:
ChatGPT predicts the next word

It changes words into numbers using math
Then, it finds clues in those numbers










“Hi, how are ___?”
“Once upon a ____”

title: AI, Chatbots & Fun!
text:
Not Always Perfect

ChatGPT isn’t always right
👩‍🔬👨‍🔬 Scientists are working on making it better!

title: AI, Chatbots & Fun!
text:

Maybe you’ll teach the next ChatGPT 👩‍🏫👨‍🏫

title: AI, Chatbots & Fun!
